Articles.Content:
[quote name='Cheesecake']I have tested it in 1.0.4.
First problem is that craft-file didn`t work. It shows an error "not compatible". The next is that there are single parts for the manipulator and a one-piece-manipulator. The one-piece-manipulator is too long for the Buran. The End-Part stack into the Aft-Section of Buran.
The Decouplers can fit radially to the tank and you can fit the Buran to it. But optically it don`t fit. Theres a gap between the decoupler and the Buran.
When I fit the Dual-Boosters the right one is OK but the left one is a little bit away from the central tank. so i must adjust it manually.
In flight the Buran is a little bit nose-heavy and a the steering is very nervous.[/QUOTE]



It is strange to 1.0.4 it should work quite well.
Craft is not working? I checked it before the release, maybe it's because of the version 1.0.4?
You mean the full version of the manipulator, and if so do not use it.
About decoupler and Buran, Dragon made a point of attachment for the Buran \ BT \ Polus, a new update soon, but decoupler is indispensable to locate the side blocks, my fault that I did not explain how to properly put now to catch up.


On the center unit ENERGIA has a point, they are made for a reason.
[URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/2b84565710531563.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447851607/2b845657/10531563_m.png[/IMG][/URL]



[URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/f3bb192010531676.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447852117/f3bb1920/10531676_m.png[/IMG][/URL]
Attach the upper part of the decoupler to this point.

[URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/872435dd10531854.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447852599/872435dd/10531854_m.png[/IMG][/URL]
Then, the mounting points on the decoupler put side blocks and engines for them.


[URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/24927e2b10531755.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447852312/24927e2b/10531755_m.png[/IMG][/URL]
The result, you have smooth symmetrical design.


As for the flight, run it smoothly and just do not make any sudden movements, the real Buran did not fly like a butterfly. :) Edited November 18, 2015 by DECQ

Thank you.
But how can i attach the Buran to the Energija? Is there a point of attachment too?
The Buran-T has no node and i canÃ‚Â´t attach it radially.

Have not tried out the mod yet, but my guess is that you'll have to attach Energia to Buran, and not the other way around. But looking at the picture there seems to be a node on Energia where one could attach Buran.
Yes, thereÃ‚Â´s a node. And this node has an decoupler. But then you have no optical connection between Buran and Energija.

[quote name='Cheesecake']Thank you.
But how can i attach the Buran to the Energija? Is there a point of attachment too?
The Buran-T has no node and i canÃ‚Â´t attach it radially.[/QUOTE]

First, build the Buran then attach decoupler, also if you want to use the Buran-T is the first to put it, then lean the Decoupler how Bobcat had if you know what I mean, I promise that the next patch will be all the easier,thanks to Dragon.
[URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/94dd50e810533157.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447858716/94dd50e8/10533157_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/6da3d46810533159.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447858719/6da3d468/10533159_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/4de78ab810533161.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1447858721/4de78ab8/10533161_m.png[/IMG][/URL]

sorry for the inconvenience :-(

I tried this in KSP 1.0.4 and like "Cheesecake" said [COLOR=#333333]the craft file shows not compatible. And I think there are parts missing in the VAB editor, like the wings, tail, etc... (maybe they don't get loaded?).[/COLOR]

Hi people!! This looks terrific!! However I tried it in KSP 1.0.4 and like "Cheesecake" said the craft file doesn't work, it says that it is not compatible with this KSP. Edited November 18, 2015 by giltj

Go into the craft file (it's a plaintext document) go to version=1.0.5 and change it to version=1.0.4. That worked for me. Another note, get the versions of the supplementary mods for the proper KSC version.

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Tested in 1.0.4 and 1.0.5 flew very nice. Nose is very heavy, this also occurred with bobcats Buran (also with .cfgs by Dragon01, IIRC). One issue I had was the decoupler to attach the Buran to energia I couldn't remove. I converted the Buran orbiter into the OK-GLI configuration (the atmospheric test unit) (no payload in bay, no radiators,fuel cells or arms) flew very well, the crew cabin survived a nose down ditch into water at 50 m/s.

note the next: the Buran bounces up and down quite a bit near the end of energia burn (+- 30 degrees pitch, longitudinal the same amount), throttle to Ã¢â€¦â€œ with 20 seconds left in burn. Edited November 19, 2015 by DarthVader

[quote name='giltj']Hi people!! This looks terrific!! However I tried it in KSP 1.0.4 and like "Cheesecake" said the craft file doesn't work, it says that it is not compatible with this KSP.[/QUOTE]

I do not know why it does not work in 1.0.4 and unfortunately I can not put you file craft. Much has already been in the rocket redone for the new patch, decoupler on Buran works like the stock, do not look at them hidden meaning, just lean the it to Buran, 8 page you will find how to attach the side blocks and if there are any questions, I'll try to help, but he is very easy going. Now I do blocks from the MIR station bobcat for version 1.0.5 and new Manipulator, it now occupies more time.

Collect Buran attach to his belly decoupler, to him the central block of Energia, as if you did Shuttle in stock.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='DarthVader']Go into the craft file (it's a plaintext document) go to version=1.0.5 and change it to version=1.0.4. That worked for me. Another note, get the versions of the supplementary mods for the proper KSC version.

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Tested in 1.0.4 and 1.0.5 flew very nice. Nose is very heavy, this also occurred with bobcats Buran (also with .cfgs by Dragon01, IIRC). One issue I had was the decoupler to attach the Buran to energia I couldn't remove. I converted the Buran orbiter into the OK-GLI configuration (the atmospheric test unit) (no payload in bay, no radiators,fuel cells or arms) flew very well, the crew cabin survived a nose down ditch into water at 50 m/s.

note the next: the Buran bounces up and down quite a bit near the end of energia burn (+- 30 degrees pitch, longitudinal the same amount), throttle to Ã¢â€¦â€œ with 20 seconds left in burn.[/QUOTE]

Well, I look at the problem from the nose, and look at the engines, make it more smooth, put on a new gimbal stock SSME and changed position RD0120 rss.

Unfortunately recreate real work Energia for the KSP is either very difficult or impossible for the side since blocks must divide themselves with a small amount of fuel and have approximately 2-4%thrust (do not remember exactly) of the total traction at the same time have to work RD 0120 100% in the same KSP it would be very helpful ...
Managed to get it to a 200km orbit with barely and fuel left in the Energia stage. Today was a good day. Thanks for bringing back Buran

Is practically all options except for the shuttle "Rus-Taifun / Eng-Typhoon", because the version of "Ptashka" was an not orbital vehicle, it's just my imagination.
By the way, I redid the texture to "Pashka" just delete black eagle and added a new "OC120".
Here are all the versions of the shuttles.


[URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/5d40b10b10555435.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448029845/5d40b10b/10555435_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/cf2a922810555437.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448029846/cf2a9228/10555437_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/9401bf3310555439.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448029849/9401bf33/10555439_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL=http://vfl.ru/fotos/5f71f33810555440.html][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448029851/5f71f338/10555440_m.png[/IMG][/URL]
Nice! :) Doesn't "Ptashka" mean "little bird" or something? If I recall correctly, I think Ptashka was the smallest of the orbiters.

[quote name='fairy']Nice! :) Doesn't "Ptashka" mean "little bird" or something? If I recall correctly, I think Ptashka was the smallest of the orbiters.[/QUOTE]

Yes,can say you have correctly transferred.)) As I recall was the name of the test aircraft, or foreign matter, I really forgot everything,will need to find information.

[quote name='DECQ']Yes,can say you have correctly transferred.)) As I recall was the name of the test aircraft, or foreign matter, I really forgot everything,will need to find information.[/QUOTE]

I didn't translate anything, I remembered it from a short documentary I saw on Youtube once :)
Will you be doing Uragan, Energia-M, and Vulkan?

[quote name='_Augustus_']Will you be doing Uragan, Energia-M, and Vulkan?[/QUOTE]

Of course, the way Uragan almost done.
i LOVE THIS just finding its a little nose heavy can seem to land it
which dockingport works with burans dockingport?
When I change the textures on the main body, I only get black and one white texture, and the rear (engine) section is also black. The wing textures work fine however, will try a re-download

[quote name='olitk00']which dockingport works with burans dockingport?[/QUOTE]

Now busy resuscitation station Mir from Bobcat will be a new docking port.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='Cdodders']When I change the textures on the main body, I only get black and one white texture, and the rear (engine) section is also black. The wing textures work fine however, will try a re-download[/QUOTE]

Place the texture to replace the files in GameData\ENERGIA\BURAN FULL\FUSELASE_AND RADIATOR.
This should help.


https://www.dropbox.com/sh/p58oo36gz8ecl0m/AADaBArMYxG14hQBgGv4hoE_a?dl=0
The textures are in the folder though...
wow ! great and very rare Space Craft Model - looks very cool. enjoy it 2 play in ksp. :)

[quote name='Cdodders']The textures are in the folder though...[/QUOTE]

It's not that, just extra textures were the wrong size, it causes a conflict with the DDS format, I put a link to the corrected texture size.

Thank you, though I do not understand why a rocket Energia do not KSP popular in the community and it is considered transporting Buran, I think it does not underestimate or she does not have a strong public relations. The unique location in the side of the payload that is very interesting, for example, you can take out a heavy payload of very diverse kinds. Here is a simple example of 65t payload,shuttle 35t.Of course it is useful in real life.

[URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/527e2aff10573669.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448191581/527e2aff/10573669_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/fe97ee5710573670.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448191583/fe97ee57/10573670_m.png[/IMG][/URL] [URL="http://vfl.ru/fotos/146de7af10573671.html"][IMG]http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1448191585/146de7af/10573671_m.png[/IMG][/URL]

By the way, I began to do this for KSP only because of rocket Energia. :) Edited November 22, 2015 by DECQ
